desc: Pretty Weird Art is the love child of Bird and Ethan Mongin, two creatives living in Columbia, SC. We've worked on various projects ranging from magazine illustration to clothing design. Our first loves are storytelling and making comics. We are science fiction and horror nerds, and have a habit of laughing at our own

layout.text: Welcome to the Pretty and the Weird!
Two distgustingly creative, happily married artists in Columbia,SC.
